article_title: Girl Scouts begin selling cookies Saturday
article_text:
The Girl Scout Cookie Program begins Saturday and lasts until March 20. Boxes of cookies are $4 and proceeds support local Girl Scouting programs.

The tradition dates back to 1917, when Girl Scouts began selling home-baked cookies to raise money for their troops and their communities.
